channel.title: Summer2015 on Joe Jean | Software Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Summer2015 on Joe Jean | Software Engineer

item.title: My First Week At the Recurse Center
item.description: This summer I’m lucky to be attending the Recurse Center (RC). RC is a 12-week long self-directed retreat for programmers. It is a place one goes to become a better programmer by working on programming projects of one’s interest. We started the first day, Monday the 26th of May, with some welcome talks by the RC founders, facilitators and employees. The Recursers from the first batch also gave us some really good advices.
